dict.acceptation: 演员；[体]运动员；[音]演奏者；播放机；

sent.orig: It even act as a music player, video player, image player, and e-reader player.
sent.trans: 它还是一款多媒体播放器，兼容音乐、视频、图片以及电子书。

sent.orig: Video player to complete the video player, speed control and tracking.
sent.trans: 视频播放器完成视频的播放，速度控制和跟踪功能。

sent.orig: This multi player mode puts a complete new and different game playoriginal single player game.
sent.trans: 这多人游戏模式增加了新的及不同的游戏玩法。

sent.orig: Dom player is a media player with a code integrity of the code has been tested.
sent.trans: 大教堂的球员是一个媒体播放器的源代码，完整的源代码已经过测试。

sent.orig: Connect a standard CD player, Music player, or other audio device.
sent.trans: 连接至标准光碟播放机、音乐播放机或其他音讯装置。
